listitem.para: Sets the contents of the edit control portion of the combobox that is identified by name.

programlisting.userinput: WINDOWCREATE "main "mywindow "mytitle 0 0 100 100 [] COMBOBOXCREATE "mywindow "mycombo 25 0 50 50 COMBOBOXADDSTRING "mycombo [3] COMBOBOXADDSTRING "mycombo [4] COMBOBOXADDSTRING "mycombo [5] COMBOBOXADDSTRING "mycombo [6] COMBOBOXSETTEXT "mycombo [3] WINDOWDELETE "mywindow
